name: GLUTTONY (DRILL)
description:
Play as a hungry Mimic chest, and Fool waves of “Players” wandering the dungeon looking for Gold.

Control

WASD - Press at the right time to attack "Players".

Be careful of colored "Players", they can only be beaten by pressing corresponding colored keys. 

Features
  • 6 Types of Unique "Players"
  • 16 Designed Waves of "Players"
  • Auto-Generated Levels with Scaling difficulty
